Welcome to Examer Take tests online Examer is a platform that allows you to take online tests right from your phone.
Reduce eye strain with dark mode Want to dim the lights? Don\'t let a bright screen mess with your eyes.Turn on dark mode to reduce eye strain and save battery
Taking tests have never been easier Scheduled tests automatically appear on the home screen. Just click on the scheduled test to start taking the test.
Create account Log in
Log in with mail Log in The email address or password that you\'ve entered is incorrect. Please check the credentials.
] Please enter a valid email. The password must be of length 8, and must contain atleast one uppercase and lowercase letter and atleast one digit. A user with the same email already exists. Please enter a valid email and password. A password is valid if, and only if,it is of length 8 , contains atleast one uppercase and lowercase letter and contains atleast one digit. Start test You are about to start the test. Please ensure that : \n\n * The device has sufficient battery.\n * Do not disturb is turned on.\n * You have a stable internet connection.\n * Any scheduled alarms are turned off.
